about_the_game:
Seoyeon Yu, a former police officer, is suspended due to an unforeseen incident. During the period, she works as a private investigator for a rich family to pay for her daughter’s heart disease treatment. However, during her investigation, she discovers evidence linking them to her husband's death. Using her ability to see people's guilt, she begins an investigation to solve the mystery.

Join Seoyeon Yu on her journey to uncover the truth and protect her family under extreme circumstances.

Features

The Guilty Hearts is a mystery adventure game.


  • Various miniature-style 3D crime scenes, from a single-room apartment to a private yacht
  • A deduction system that connects evidence and testimonies through logical reasoning
  • Tricks and cases unfolding in modern-day Seoul
  • 5 episodes and over 30 characters

content_descriptors.notes:
Due to the protagonist of the game is a detective in charge of crimes of violence, the game contains text depictions about mature contents(e.g. crimes including murder and drug use, trying of suicide, and some sexual relation between characters).
There is no visually intense expressions for these content, however, please care about it if you are sensitive to these contents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel i3/AMD Ryzen3 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card has 2GB or more VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel i3/AMD Ryzen3 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card has 2GB or more VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
